Unnamed Package

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Denominations
    The Denominations class is a representation of the different coins and bills to be inserted and dispensed in the vending machine.
    Driver
    Driver class for the vending machine
    Inventory
    This Inventory class handles and shows the inventory of the vending machine in the program
    Item
    The item class represents a product inside a vending machine.
    MainMenu
    This MainMenu class displays and executes the features of a vending machine
    MainMenuController
    This MainMenuController class is linked to the model and view of the main menu
    MainMenuView
    This MainMenuView class displays the main menu and is linked to the MainMenuController and MainMenu model
    Maintenance
    This Maintenance class is the representation of the maintenance features of the created vending machine.
    MaintenanceController
    This MaintenanceController implements the ActionListener interface
    MaintenanceView
    This MaintenanceView displays the maintenance menu of the vending machine
    RegularVendingController
    This RegularVendingController class is linked to the model and view of the regular vending machine
    RegularVendingView
    This RegularVendingView represents the 'View' of the MVC architecture that we used for our Regular Vending Machine
    Slot
    This Slot class represents the slots the vending machine has that is mapped for specific item.
    SpecialVendingController
    This SpecialVendingController inherits the RegularVendingController class.
    SpecialVendingMachine
    This SpecialVendingMachine class inherits the Regular VendingMachine class.
    SpecialVendingView
    This SpecialVendingView inherits the RegularVendingView class
    VendingMachine
    This VendingMachine class allows for creating slots, dispensing an item, collecting payment, producing change, and performing maintenance
